name: Gold Mine
overview: A collect & avoid style game created in AMOS which is based on the game stylings of Oil's Well. Written in AMOS Professional. Coding & graphics by Paul ''ExiE'' Strejcek and Johny/Vectors. Music by unknown author. Game includes a level editor allowing players to create their own levels. The player mines gold from the underground using a special mining device, while having to watch out for various creatures that get in the way.
